content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. How can I help you today? Are you looking for help with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Yeah, my AC stopped working last night and it’s blowing hot air. I need someone to come out and look at it ASAP.
I'm sorry to hear that your AC isn't working. I'll help you get that sorted as quickly as possible. To get started, may I please have your name?
Thank you, Mike. Could you please provide your address so I can make sure we serve your area and send a technician to the right place?
Thank you. Let me confirm that we serve your area.

I'm sorry, Mike, but it looks like your address at 254 Industrial Park Rd, Riverton is currently outside our service area. I know this is frustrating, especially with your AC down. Would you like me to recommend another provider, or is there anything else I can help with?
Are you kidding me? No, that's the only place around here I could find online with availability. Can't you help out just this once? It's seriously urgent and I'm willing to pay extra if I have to.
I completely understand how urgent this is, Mike. Your comfort is a top priority. Let me double-check with our scheduling team to see if there’s any exception I can make for your location.
reason: Customer is outside service area but has a critical need and is willing to pay extra. Requesting human assistance.
